title: Ranked game crashed nothing happens in the last 15 mins...
body:
Someone have the same issue?
I played duoq with a friend and we both got disconnected from the game 
and cant rejoin the game...
What can i do?

replies.body: We still canÂ´t reconnect, how are u doin?

wow i like it! Back to the beta riot! Play Heimer set turrents and win the game!
And ofc there will be no Lost prevented!

Same Problem here, at first everyone DCD and couldnt reconnect , then we could reconnect for like half a minute but it went down again.
I assumed someone Drophacked the game but dunno... if theres more people with the same thing happening ..
